content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great investment. So, what price are you considering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I would say a price around 500 Euro per month would be fair. It's a newly built apartment and the location is in the city center, but the size is quite small, just 50 square meters.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I see. 500 Euro is an interesting starting point. However, I must mention that the location and the quality of the construction are quite exceptional. I believe the value of the apartment warrants a higher price. What do you think about 750 Euro per month? This would reflect the premium nature of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, I was hoping for a more affordable price. How about we meet in the middle at 625 Euro per month? It's a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hmm, 625 Euro is certainly closer to what I had in mind. However, I'm willing to negotiate a bit further. What if we go with 675 Euro per month? This would still be a good deal for you considering the amenities and the desirability of the location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds fair. I agree to the price of 675 Euro per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm glad we could reach an agreement, Max. The apartment is certainly in high demand due to its prime location and modern amenities. I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I don't have any other questions at the moment. If you don't mind, let's proceed with the lease agreement for 675 Euro per month. 'I agree to the price of [675] Euro!'
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Max. I'm sure you'll enjoy living in this vibrant neighborhood. Let's proceed with the lease agreement. I'll have my assistant send you the paperwork as soon as possible. Thank you for choosing my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking forward to moving into the apartment. 'I agree to the price of [675] Euro!'
name: Max Müller from Germany
